Trenton.name: Trenton
Trenton.description:
<c=088482>Trenton</c>
A time wizard from another dimension. His cards shift <c=boldPink>energy</c> across turns, adds cards to the top of the <c=boldPink>deck</c>, and responds to events of <c=boldPink>the previous turn</c>.

TemporalEngine.name: Temporal Engine
TemporalEngine.description: Cycle between gaining 1 energy for two turns and losing 1 energy for a third turn.

flippableDiscount.name: Flippable Discount
flippableDiscount.description: This card has <c=keyword>alternate costs</c> when flipped.

description.None: Add <c=status>evade</c> = total dmg/2 of enemy's cannon attacks
description.A: Add <c=status>evade</c> = total dmg/2 of enemy's cannon attacks
description.B: Add <c=status>evade</c> = total dmg of enemy's cannon attacks

description.None: Attack using all <c=energy>energy</c> for x2 DMG each
description.A: Attack using all <c=energy>energy</c> for x2.5 DMG each
description.B: Attack using all <c=energy>energy</c> for x2 DMG each

Abeyance.name: Abeyance

description.None: Pick a <c=cardtrait>discarded</c> card. Send it to the top of your <c=white>deck</c>.
description.A: Pick two <c=cardtrait>discarded</c> cards. Send them to the top of your <c=white>deck</c>.
description.B: Pick an <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c> card. Send it to the top of your <c=white>deck</c>.

Abeyance.GetCardSelectText: Pick a discarded card to send to the top of your deck.

description.None: Heal equal to total hull DMG taken from last turn
description.A: Heal equal to total hull DMG taken from last turn
description.B: Heal equal to total hull DMG taken from last turn, plus one more

description.None: Search <c=white>deck</c>. Send one card to hand and one to the top.
description.A: Search <c=white>deck</c>. Send one card to hand and one to the top.
description.B: Search <c=white>deck</c>. Send two cards to hand.

GetCardSelectText.ToHand: Pick a card in the deck to send to hand.
GetCardSelectText.ToTopDrawPile: Pick a card in the deck to send to the top of the deck.
